name: Space Sbeve
description:
General Information

-Game Idea: From many topdown bullet hell games that came before us.

-Game Platform: PC & Consoles + Mobile Devices

-Game Type: Bullet Hell

-Target Player Age:12 and above

-Target Player Type: Mediocre gamers

Gameplay

-Its a game about destroying the planets bases.

-In order to survive you need to dodge planets defending systems and bullets.

-Also our ship has a beam attack which is capable of destroying a city.

-But the beam needs to charge before shooting.

Credits

Atilla Bora Aydın

Zeynep Çınar

Ezgi Yürekli
